IMMEDIATE  
NO. CAS-9(15)/98/PIC 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
‘A’ WING, JANPATH BHAWAN, 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI – 110001/ 
Dsated: 30.04.2010 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.  11 / 2010 
 
 
SUBJECT : RENEWAL OF AIRPORT ENTRY PASSES (AEP) EXPIRED ON 
31.12.2009 & 31.03.2010. 
 
 
 
In continuation to this Bureau AVSEC Circular No. 09/2010                      
dated 26.03.2010, validity of the existing computerized Airport Entry Passes (AEP’s) 
excluding commercial AEP’s, which expired on 31.12.2009 & 31.03.2010 are further 
extended by 03 months. Now these AEP’s shall remain valid upto 31st July, 2010. 
 
 
 
( M.Malaviya) 
IPS 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution: As per the list attached.
